sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; const fetch = require('isomorphic-fetch'); class Banner extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bannerdescription: "", bannerUrl: "", bannerName: "" }; } componentDidMount() { var query = ` query ActivityById($id: ID!){ homeBanners(where:{id:$id}){ id description header_file_type, home_banner{ id, previewUrl, url, provider, provider_metadata, name, } } } `; var variables = { "id": 3 } fetch(process.env.GRAPHURL, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ query, variables }), }) .then(response => response.json()) .then((response) => { //console.log(response); let homeBanner = response.data.homeBanners[0]; console.log('=====',homeBanner); this.setState({ bannerdescription: homeBanner.description, bannerUrl: homeBanner.home_banner.url, bannerName: homeBanner.home_banner.name, }); }); //console.log(homeBannerData); } render(){ const { bannerdescription , bannerUrl ,bannerName} = this.state; return ( <>

Our team

Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa.

{/*

Our Team

{bannerdescription}

*/} ) } } export default Banner;
